version_description:
- Updated interface in Showdown and Crew Hangout race mode, now users able to see points they receive if beat opponent
- Added video quality settings
- Minor fixes

- Overall performance improvements
- Game allows use full NOS power even if NOS was activated slightly before green race light

- New crew hangout and showdown events
- Performance improvements
- New racing lobbies

- Warehouse major update: 9 brand new cars and blueprints
- Improved overall performance
- New Crew Hangout max edition performance cars

- Warehouse updates: new matte colors, exclusive rides and blueprints
- New Crew Hangout cars

- Fixed app crushing in Multiplayer lobby when opponent has rare combination of installed aero parts
- Fixed app stucking when join Multiplayer lobby and some of opponents have exclusive matte paint

- Major security update
- Five brand new showroom cars
- New Crew Hangout cars
- Twelve brand new Bronze, Silver and Gold Warehouse cars & blueprints
New Exclusive Cars for Crew Hangout
